details: Feature - Implement integrated registration feature to collect team information automatically.
Feature - Implement contest announcement notification feature.
Feature - Implement private problem bank and support import problem bank problems to contests.
Feature - Allow downloading and uploading problems.
Feature - Allow restricting access to contests by division.
Feature - Allow editing team information from settings.
Feature - Add a new tester role for contest testers.
Improvement - Rebase backend image on Debian 11.
